name: Dragon Rider: Play the game to win dragon throne
name_original: Dragon Rider: Play the game to win dragon throne
description:
Fulfill the fantasy of riding the dragons, rider it to kingdom you lost, free the unsullied and salves and get back your throne. kill the master and monsters everywhere you find. Feed her when your fire breathing dragon feels hungry so you can keep it riding. Rebels have gathered forces and archers on their fortress, leash the fire inside you. Burn them all enemies and their mythical monsters alike. Dragon slayers, Kings Knights are no match to you.
Features:

-> Fantasy, Myths turned into reality
-> Ride the fire breathing dragon
-> Monsters and archers fight sequences
-> Lively environment
-> Fantasy fight with archers and knights
